name: MM MemoMath
description:
MM MemoMath is a memory and math game designed for the Apple Watch. You can also play on your iPhone.

In this game, your memory and your mental math capabilities will be really useful. The goal is to remember the previous number and to find the calculation that was used to compute the new one. The faster you are, the more points you win.

You can also play the game on your iPhone.

World Rankings have been implemented to compare your best score to all other players. They are managed independently on the Apple Watch and on the iPhone.
